<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Send Feedback Reminder"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/send-reminder/{thread_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Send a feedback reminder via Telegram.

Args:
    thread_id: The board meeting thread ID
    reminder_type: "t7" or "t30"

Triggers n8n workflow to send Telegram message with HITL buttons.
